content.raw: Well, I am not sure, but it looks suspicious … in the WiKi is `subt::kBaseStationName` which is mapped to string`base_station` and it probably did not work for hello world, so the author put there directly the old `BaseStation` string? Or it depends in which setup you run it? \(I did quick check with my old code and `BaseStation` string but it was not the source of the problem, or not the only one\)
content.html: Well, I am not sure, but it looks suspicious … in the WiKi is subt::kBaseStationName which is mapped to stringbase_station and it probably did not work for hello world, so the author put there directly the old BaseStation string? Or it depends in which setup you run it? (I did quick check with my old code and BaseStation string but it was not the source of the problem, or not the only one)
